Description:
Position Title:             Logistics Warehouse Executive Employment Type:     Full-timeSalary:                         up to 6K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Dubai, UAE About the Client:One of the leading suppliers of HVAC products and solutions across the globe. Job Responsibilities:Oversee warehouse operations.
Liaise with freight forwarding companies.
Plan deliveries and shipments from warehouse to customers.
Place orders from suppliers/factories abroad to Dubai.
Monitor and maintain inventory levels. Skills
Skills:
Open to Indian nationals
Male, 40 years old and below
Should have at least 2 years of UAE experience in the same role
